text: Cyril Buscaglione (born 24 February 1972) is a retired French tennis player. Buscaglione has a career high ATP singles ranking of 286 achieved on 28 October 1996. He also has a career high doubles ranking of 268 achieved on 7 October 1996. Buscaglione has won 1 ATP Challenger doubles title at the 1997 Tampere Open. ==Tour titles== {| class=wikitable !
